content: The spec says the first call to $closure should return an empty ConceptMap (http://build.fhir.org/terminology-service.html#closure-init), but ConceptMap.source and ConceptMap.target are mandatory (1..*) properties. What values should these have on the first invocation?
no values. I guess we'll have to adjust the minimums, unless anyone has another idea
I think that's the way. Could introduce an invariant somewhere I guess, if we do want to constrain non-$closure ConceptMaps
